name: Recap Time TG Bot Nodejs Source
description: Open-sourced Recap Time bot fully rewritten in Node.js

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables.

TGBOT_TOKEN.description: Get your Telegram bot token from BotFater. Please avoid using this dev token!

PORT.description: Set the port to the supported ones by Telegram for webhooks.

PM2_PUBLIC_KEY.description: By default, you are using dev tokens provided by the team. Sign up on app.pm2.io, create an new bucket and get public keys.

PM2_PRIVATE_KEY.description: By default, you are using dev tokens provided by the team. Sign up on app.pm2.io, create an new bucket and get private keys.
